message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CE, cs.CR 

The paper focuses on using Information Retrieval (IR) term weighting models and word embeddings to analyze the sentiment of financial disclosures of companies in stock markets. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) categories. Additionally, the paper uses natural language processing techniques such as sentiment analysis (cs.CL) and fusion methods to combine text and market data resources (cs.CE). Finally, the paper investigates the characteristics of reports of companies in different financial sectors, which could fall under the category of Cryptography and Security (cs.CR).
